titles: Enhance your turnstile security and control with our solutions.
paragraphs: We offer solutions that will protect your space from unwanted entry.
Our solutions provide security and comfort in all situations.

TurnstileBanner.title: The best solutions for your access control
TurnstileBanner.content: Choose high-quality turnstiles for any area, tailored to your needs.

BannerList.title: Our Range
BannerList.text: We offer entrance security and control systems that allow you to:
list: Allow employees or authorized persons to enter using QR codes, RFID cards, FaceID devices, and fingerprint scanners.
Monitor employees' entry and exit dates and times.
Generate reports on employees' entry and exit data for different time periods (month, quarter, year).
Control visitor access with the ability to limit the number of entries. In addition, we implement other features and functionalities in the system according to the client's needs.

QrScanSection.title: QR code scanner
QrScanSection.description: If there is no opportunity or space to install a turnstile, we offer you the perfect solution: a QR scanning device that will make your space more organized and convenient.
advantages: Convenient and simple installation. The device is easily attached to the wall and does not take up unnecessary space.
Compact design: A minimalist solution that blends in with any interior.
Functionality: Fast and accurate QR code scanning for access control or other processes.
Cost-effective solution: Get the same effective control without the need to install a turnstile.

MadeInArmeniaSection.title: Made in Armenia
MadeInArmeniaSection.description: We offer a wide range of turnstiles that suit different needs and environments, from offices to high-traffic public areas. Our products are manufactured in Armenia, ensuring high quality and competitive prices. Turnstiles are suitable for both security and law enforcement. We also offer customized solutions to meet your requirements.

TurnstileInfoSection.title: Your Reliable Choice of Turnstiles
TurnstileInfoSection.description: The turnstiles are equipped with the latest technologies: card, QR code and facial recognition systems. They are made of high-quality materials, ensuring durability and long-term use. Our products provide easy installation, technical support and affordable prices to meet the needs of any business.

titles: These features make turnstiles an ideal solution for various areas to ensure safety and efficiency.
Our turnstile services, from sales to maintenance
Our company not only sells turnstiles, but also provides their professional maintenance, freeing you from technical problems and guaranteeing the uninterrupted operation of the equipment.
Track the entry and exit of your employees
Our turnstile systems allow you to easily and accurately track the entry and exit of your employees, providing a high level of control.

DeviceSection.titleTurnstilePage: You can also find us here.
DeviceSection.descriptionHomePage: We offer a wide range of security systems suitable for both homes and business premises.
DeviceSection.descriptionTurnstilePage: We offer a wide range of security systems suitable for both homes and business premises.

questions.question: What is a turnstile and where is it used?
questions.answer: A turnstile is a device that restricts access to certain areas, ensuring security and control. It is often used in institutions, offices, events, and public transportation.

questions.question: What types of turnstiles do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer various types of turnstiles: rotary, full-height, tripod, and electronic turnstiles. Each type is suitable for different operating conditions and levels of security.

questions.question: What software is needed to manage turnstiles?
questions.answer: Specialized software is required to manage turnstiles, allowing control of access, tracking passages, and generating reports. We offer integrated solutions for managing all our devices

questions.question: How are turnstiles connected to the management system?
questions.answer: Turnstiles can be connected to the management system via Ethernet or RS-485. We provide all necessary instructions and technical support for installation.

questions.question: Can turnstiles be integrated with video surveillance systems?
questions.answer: Yes, our turnstiles can be integrated with video surveillance systems to enhance security. This allows for tracking passages and recording video in real-time.

questions.question: What is the warranty on turnstiles?
questions.answer: All our turnstiles come with a 12-month warranty. We also offer maintenance and repair services after the warranty period expires.

questions.question: How do I choose the right turnstile for my business?
questions.answer: The choice of a turnstile depends on your security needs, volume of passages, and characteristics of the premises. Our specialists are ready to help you find the optimal solution.

questions.question: Do you provide installation services for turnstiles?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer installation services for turnstiles. Our team of experienced specialists will ensure quality installation and setup of the equipment.

questions.question: How can I order a turnstile and software?
questions.answer: You can order a turnstile and software through our website by filling out the order form or by contacting us by phone. We are also ready to answer all your questions.

questions.question: Is there an option to test the equipment before purchase?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer the opportunity to test certain models of turnstiles before purchase. Please contact our manager for more information about available options.

SecuritySystemsBanner.title: Overall Security Management of the Area through Your Phone
SecuritySystemsBanner.description: Smart solutions for barriers, vehicle recognition, facial recognition, alarm activation, and more.

WhyChooseUsSection.title: Why choose us?
list: Customized solutions for your space and business needs.
Innovative technologies integrated with any infrastructure.

SecurityInfoSection.smartShelvesParagraph: Card-operated bedside cabinets webex A great solution for having a safe box that is safe from thieves, also available in different colors. You bring the card close to the cabinet and it opens automatically.
SecurityInfoSection.firstTitle: Stay Connected with Your Security System.
SecurityInfoSection.firstParagraph: With our advanced solutions, you can monitor your space's security from anywhere. Use our convenient app or website to view, respond, and control your system instantly. Stay connected to your devices in real time, whether you're at home or on the go.
SecurityInfoSection.secondParagraph: Respond immediately to any threat with alarm activation. Our system is designed to notify you of danger through sound, light, and remote alerts. With additional integration, you can activate or deactivate the alarm from your phone without being on-site.

firstList.title: Features:
list: User-friendly interface with compatibility across all devices.

tm22Info: A modern and practical solution for your bedroom – the WebEx Premium Smart nightstand combines elegant design with multifunctional features.
Key Features: Bluetooth connectivity – allowing you to connect to your smartphone or other devices and enjoy your favorite music wirelessly.
Wireless charging – convenient charging for your smartphone (compatible with Qi-enabled devices).
Light effects – built-in LED lights in various colors that create a relaxing or romantic atmosphere.
Socket – adapted for connecting any electronic devices.
Design & Dimensions: 50x40x46 cm (H×W×D), ideal for placing next to your bed.
Style: Modern, minimalist design that fits into any interior.
Materials: A combination of natural stone and wood, ensuring durability and premium quality.
The WebEx Premium Smart nightstand will make your bedroom more comfortable and equipped with technological solutions. Buy now and enjoy your smart home!
The right choice – for modern living.

OurSolutionsSection.title: Our Solutions.
itemDescriptions: Use your phone for the automatic opening and closing of barriers. Our systems ensure quick response, motion control, and precise data collection.
Smart vehicle recognition solutions enable automated entry and exit, while artificial intelligence records license plates and driving patterns.
Facial recognition technology provides a high level of security by allowing entry only to authorized individuals, preventing unauthorized access.
Security solutions with infrared rays are perfect for large areas. They provide motion detection and alert systems, allowing you to respond directly from your phone.
Laser-based security solutions are ideal for large areas. They provide motion detection and alert systems, allowing you to respond directly from your phone.
Smart vehicle recognition solutions enable automated entry and exit, while artificial intelligence records license plates and driving patterns.
Facial recognition technology provides a high level of security by allowing entry only to authorized individuals, preventing unauthorized access.
Infrared-ray security solutions are excellent for large areas. They provide motion detection and alert systems, allowing you to respond directly from your phone.

metadata.title: Turnstiles for Sale | Турникеты на продажу
metadata.description: Our turnstile sales website provides innovative and reliable solutions for access control. Our range includes high-quality turnstiles that ensure security, efficiency, and convenience in various environments—from business centers to gyms and government institutions. High quality and durability | Modern design and technology |  Fast delivery and installation | Professional consultation -- Наш сайт продажи турникетов предлагает инновационные и надежные решения для контроля доступа. CustomerDataComments.name: David
CustomerDataComments.comment: I’m very satisfied with the upgrade in our gym. The turnstile works quickly and smoothly — I just walk through, and the system instantly checks my membership. No unnecessary questions or delays. It’s convenient both for clients and for the staff, because everything is transparent and fair.

CustomerDataComments.name: Aram
CustomerDataComments.comment: After installing the employee time-tracking system, the factory’s operations have become much more organized. Now every entry is recorded automatically — no paper logs or human error involved. This has helped reduce lateness, improve discipline, and ensure transparency.

CustomerDataComments.name: Anna
CustomerDataComments.comment: We strive to make our club not just a place for games, but truly a safe and comfortable space for every child. Installing turnstiles and wristbands is our step toward supporting parents. We understand how important it is to be confident that your child is safe.

CustomerDataComments.name: Arthur
CustomerDataComments.comment: We, the team of the fitness club, would like to express our sincere gratitude for the installation of the turnstiles equipped with iris recognition technology. This innovative solution has significantly enhanced the level of security, streamlined the reception operations, and made access to our facilities much more convenient for our members.

CustomerDataComments.name: Mariam
CustomerDataComments.comment: Honestly, I didn’t even expect it to be this convenient. Coming home in the evening to a warm and bright house, with everything turning on automatically, feels like a miracle! Thank you for the modern comfort.

CustomerDataComments.name: Gevorg
CustomerDataComments.comment: As the developer of a multi-apartment complex, we pay great attention to the comfort and safety of our residents. Recently, we installed a smart barrier gate system at the parking entrance, and this solution has fully met our expectations
